text: 12:9 Jenesis 3:1; 3:4; 3:14; Luk 10:18; 22:31; Jon 12:31; Akar Mogomem 9:1; 20:2-3Ezɨ Maikelɨn enselba kuruzir ekiam akunizɨ a izaghira irɨ. Kar kuruzir fomɨra itim, me Satan a garɨsi egha uaghan an ziar mam, “Gumazir Akam Gumazamizibagh asim.” A gumazir nguazimɨn itir gumazamizibagh ifarim, a datɨrɨghɨn uan enselba ko iza nguazim girɨ.
